_sText:
This map has been in the works for a while.  It uses a new spawn placement scheme (vertical difference vs. opposing sides) which makes play a bit more vertically oriented.

This map also makes extensive use of func_detail brushes to speed up high-quality vis rendering.  This map rendered in 'normal' vis in under 30 seconds because of the optimizations I've made.

It may be required that qubemaps be built using 'buildcubemaps' in the console, but I am pretty sure I got em working already, I'm kinda new to getting bumpmaps and cubemaps to actually work properly.

All in all, I designed this map to run fast, with plenty of players.
